description: clawinsure MVP for deterministic quotes, policy issuance, claim adjudication, and payouts.

userStories.title: Coverage quotes
userStories.description: As a requester, I can request deterministic coverage quotes based on risk.
acceptanceCriteria: Risk uses clawrep tier + dispute rate
Premium computed with minor-unit deterministic math
userStories.notes: Validated in staging+prod clawinsure smoke (quote create assertions).

userStories.title: Claims intake
userStories.description: As a claimant, I can submit insurance claims with evidence refs.
userStories.notes: Smoke validates unresolved trial ref path returns deterministic 422 and claimant-only read access path.

userStories.title: Provider bonds
userStories.description: As a provider, I can issue bond-backed policies.
acceptanceCriteria: Bond metadata exposed via policy read
userStories.notes: Provider bond issuance persisted in provider_bonds table and returned through policy endpoints.

userStories.title: Claims adjudication
userStories.description: As an operator, I can approve/reject claims with deterministic state transitions.
acceptanceCriteria: Approved amount bounded by request and coverage
userStories.notes: Adjudication + replay assertions pass in staging/prod smoke with deterministic idempotent response behavior.

userStories.title: Premium payouts
userStories.description: As the insurer, I can payout approved claims through ledger transfers.
userStories.notes: Payout and replay assertions pass in both envs with ledger transfer refs persisted on claim/policy.

userStories.title: Risk scoring
userStories.description: As a system, I can expose deterministic risk scoring for quotes and ops.
acceptanceCriteria: Risk derives from clawrep tier + dispute signal
userStories.notes: Risk endpoint and claims report exercised in staging+prod smoke with totals and latency payload assertions.
